cards.title: Oryon
cards.desc: User Interface Software based on the GLRenderer library written in C++.

cards.title: GLRenderer
cards.desc: OpenGL Based Forward and Deferred Renderer using Glad and GLFW.

cards.title: ImBridge
cards.desc: C++ library that allows to access and draw parameters inside ImGui applications.

cards.title: Edit your scene
cards.desc: Move, rotate and scale objects as you like, change parameters of materials and renderer settings.

cards.title: Import GLTF files
cards.desc: Import GLTF files inside Oryon (File -> Import -> glTF)

cards.title: Deferred Rendering
cards.desc: You can render up to 1000 lights in your scene thanks to Deferred Rendering

cards.title: Particle System
cards.desc: Particle Systems help you populate your scene with various components like point lights

cards.title: Soft Shadows
cards.desc: (WIP) With the help of Percentage-Closer Soft Shadows algorithm, render soft shadows from a directional light

cards.title: Controls
cards.desc: Navigate with Alt (Pan: MiddleMouseButton, Rotate: LeftClick, Zoom: RightClick)
